# [Interview #979: Reddit AMA 2013, Entry #54](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=979#54)

#### [HerowannabeÂ ()](http://www.reddit.com/r/Fantasy/comments/1ced7z/iamstilla_novelist_named_brandon_sanderson_ama/c9fr744?context=3)

Was Sazed the intended recipient of "The Letter"?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Meaning, the one in the epigraphs? No, that is written to someone else. (They're not from a world you've seen yet.)
